description.message: LivePage reloads website resources (such as CSS, LESS, HTML and JavaScript) as they change on the server.

browser_action.description: The default tooltip on the icon

@protocol_not_supported.message: Sorry, the protocol used on this page is not supported.
@protocol_not_supported.description: When the protocol used is not support on a URL.

@file_protocol_needs_enabling.message: Sorry, the file:// protocol needs enabling. Please check the "Allow access to file URLs" for LivePage on the extensions page (chrome://chrome/extensions/).
@file_protocol_needs_enabling.description: When the protocol file:// needs enabling

@live.description: The badge text for a live page

@disable_on_this_tab.description: Icon hover text when livepage is running.

@enable_on_this_tab.description: Icon hover text when livepage isn't running.
